sentences.en: Apart from selenium and vapour - deposited germanium and silicon, glasses are at least diatomic.
sentences.cn: 除了硒和汽相沉积的锗和硅之外, 玻璃至少是二原子的.

sentences.en: Conclusion: Nano red elemental selenium has anti - aging function at nutritional level.
sentences.cn: 结论适当剂量的纳米红色元素硒具有延缓衰老保健作用.

sentences.en: It contains a lot of tryptophan, manganese, iron, protein and selenium.
sentences.cn: 它含有很多色氨酸，锰，铁，蛋白质和硒等元素。

sentences.en: It will also render useless any intake of inorganic selenium.
sentences.cn: 它还会使无机硒的任何摄入失去作用.

sentences.en: No significant changes for cardiac selenium content and superoxide dismutase activity wereobserved.
sentences.cn: 心肌硒含量和超氧物歧化酶活性均无改变.

sentences.en: Objective : To observe the antisenility effect of Ganoderma Lucidum rich in selenium.
sentences.cn: 目的: 观察富硒灵芝的抗衰老作用.

sentences.en: Other good sources of selenium: seafood, beef and whole - grain breads.
sentences.cn: 其他含硒食物有: 海产品, 牛肉和全麦面包.

sentences.en: Selenium and aluminum are found in vanishingly small concentrations within living things.
sentences.cn: 硒和铝在生物中含量其微.

sentences.en: Selenium is a non metal similar to sulphur in its chemical properties.
sentences.cn: 在化学性质方面硒是非金属类似硫磺.

sentences.en: Selenium is an important trace element for human heal th.
sentences.cn: 硒是一种重要的人体必需微量元素.

sentences.en: Small amounts of selenium are essential for health and help build a strong immune system to fight off infections and diseases.
sentences.cn: 少量的硒元素对人体健康是必要的，能帮着建立一个抵抗传染病和疾病的免疫系统。

sentences.en: Source of essential nutrients, including vitamins C, B complex phosphate and selenium.
sentences.cn: 提供必需营养素, 包括维他命C 、 杂、、及硒.

sentences.en: The essential trace mineral, selenium, is of great importance on human health.
sentences.cn: 硒是人体必需的微量矿物质, 对健康有着极其重要的作用.

sentences.en: The Selenium tests form a suite of automated browser integration tests.
sentences.cn: 硒试验形成了一整套自动化浏览器集成测试.

sentences.en: The suitable selenium can enhance the immunity function and the morbid resistance.
sentences.cn: 适量的硒能增强免疫功能和对疾病的抵抗力.

sentences.en: Therefore, selenium has important role in preventing and curing the tumors.
sentences.cn: 因此, 硒在肿瘤的防治中具有非常重要的作用.

sentences.en: Trace elements of: iron, copper, manganese , zinc, selenium, cobalt, molybdenum etc.
sentences.cn: 微量元素 ﹕ 铁 ﹐ 铜 ﹐ 锰 ﹐ 锌 ﹐ 硒 ﹐ 钴 ﹐ 钼等.

sentences.en: We’d normally get minerals such as selenium and copper from plants.
sentences.cn: 我们通常从植物中获取矿物质比如硒和铜。

trans.tran_en: a poisonous chemical substance, used in electrical instruments to make them sensitive to light. It is a chemical  element  : symbol Se
